definition: to make even/to balance/(fig.) to be even/to call it quits
to pull/to tear/(of cloth, thread etc) to buy/to chat/to gossip/(coll.) (Tw) ridiculous/hokey
variant of 扯[che3]/to pull/to tear
surname Ping
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]

sentences.english: They decided to settle their debts with their creditors, and call it quits.
sentences.chinese: 他们商议决定以资抵债，两下扯平。

sentences.english: You buy me a drink, then we are even, ok?
sentences.chinese: 你请我喝一杯，我们就算扯平了，好吗？

sentences.english: They balanced my poor grades in these other classes .
sentences.chinese: 这样就扯平了其他课程的坏分数。

sentences.english: We're even, OK? I don't owe you no more favors.
sentences.chinese: 我们扯平了，明白吧？我不欠你任何人情了。

sentences.english: Bones: And I told you who it was so we’re even .
sentences.chinese: 结果还是我告诉你谁干的，我们俩扯平咯。

sentences.english: Since you paid for dinner last time, I'll pay this time, and we'll call it even.
sentences.chinese: 因为上次你请晩餐，这次就由我来付账，我们扯平了。

sentences.english: Even with a collapse in the overall economy Google's results barely changed.
sentences.chinese: 与经济全面崩溃时期扯平，谷歌的业绩才几乎没变。

sentences.english: I'll get even with him one day.
sentences.chinese: 总有一天我要跟他扯平。

sentences.english: “Then we’re quits, ” she said. She knelt down beside him and helped to pick up the trash.
sentences.chinese: “那我们扯平了，”她说着在他旁边蹲下帮着收捡。

sentences.english: Just give me that Chinese paper lantern and we’ll call it even.
sentences.chinese: 给我那个中国纸灯笼吧，我们就扯平了。

sentences.english: It will not take long before these profits and losses even out.
sentences.chinese: 这些利润和损失用不了多长时间就会扯平。

sentences.english: Just return the loot eachdill call it even.
sentences.chinese: 还回赃物我们就扯平了。

sentences.english: Love is like this, the best love hate even the two do not owe.
sentences.chinese: 爱情就是这样，最好爱恨扯平两不相欠。

definition: to be even/to be quits/to be even-steven
see 兩不相欠|两不相欠[liang3 bu4 xiang1 qian4]
loan settled (business term)/business complete to the satisfaction of both parties
to write off at one stroke
no better (or worse) than each other/both in the same boat
not to be repeated/not to be taken as a precedent/just this once
It's all exaggeration, you don't need to take it seriously/a fuss about nothing/nothing to write home about
pinyin: sha1 ren2 bu4 guo4 tou2 dian3 di4

definition: thus/in this way/like this
extreme benevolence, utmost duty (idiom); meticulous virtue and attention to duty
It is better to squash enmity rather than keeping it alive (proverb)
pinyin: yuan1 jia1 yi2 jie3 bu4 yi2 jie2

definition: to take advantage of sb's difficulties (idiom)
lit. don't fight, won't make friends (idiom); an exchange of blows may lead to friendship/no discord, no concord
to write off/to cancel
to forget and not bear recriminations (idiom); to let bygones be bygones/There is no point in crying over spilt milk.
to pardon/to excuse/to forgive
(of marriage or business partners) to break up (idiom)/to separate
